home.subtitle: WELCOME
home.text:
The apartment house is located in the southwest of island Brač, sheltered in a small bay at the seaside. 

Search through our apartments and pick one which suits your needs. 

When you are ready to book, feel free to fill out our booking form :)
home.blueText: We look forward to your arrival and wish you a pleasant stay with us!

about.subtitle: ABOUT US
about.text:
Leave your daily routine behind and relax on you balcony or terrace with a great view to the horizon. You're only a few steps to jump into crystal clear sea or spend a relaxing day in a sun bed at the beach. Finish your sunny day listening to the crickets' evening concert and look back on your Croatian impressions. 

Within a short walk you can reach a historic town of Milna with marina, restaurants, cafes and shopping facilities. Alternatively to beach life you can go on a trip on the island and visit one of the several sights. 

Enjoy your holiday the best way you can!

apartments.subtitle: APARTMENTS
apartments.intro: Search our apartments and find the accommodation that suits your needs. If you find the apartment you want, please feel free to book and we will reply as soon as possible :)
apartments.equipment-text: Besides standard furniture all flats are equipped with kettle, microwave oven and Senseo coffee maker. We provide lining, towels and hairdryer. A big barbecue is made available to our guests. We also have covered parking space for your car.
